title: CSE 4998 - Undergraduate Research in Computer Science and Engineering
description: Opportunity for undergraduate student to conduct research in Computer Science and Engineering. Prereq: Permission of instructor. Repeatable to a maximum of 10 cr hrs or 10 completions. This course is graded S/U. Class Notes: Please be sure you have permission from the instructor to sign up for this course as well as for the number of credit hours.
attributes: Not eligible for College Credit Plus program
professors: Gagan Agrawal,Anish Arora,Gojko Babic,Bettina Bair,Raef Bassily,Mikhail Belkin,Spyridon Blanas,Michael Bond,Paolo Bucci,Umit Catalyurek,Jian Chen,Bryan Choi,Roger Crawfis,James Davis,Tamal Dey,John Fosler-Lussier
